title: Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre
subtitle: Venue: Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre
description:
Situated at the intersection of Brisbane academic, cultural and technology precincts,  Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre affords delegates, exhibitors and visitors convenient access to Australiaâ€™s most cosmopolitan city.

  Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre is more than a landmark venue. Brisbane Convention & Exhibition Centre functions as an incubator for ideas, a champion of change and an advocate for community.
